data.actual_result: The qs shows the updated channel name in the last channel category.
data.expected_result: The qs suggests the last channel you were in.
data.short_description: When you change the name of a channel you're currently in, the quick switcher suggests it as the last channel.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open a channel of a server you have manage channels permission. - Click on the 3 dots overflow menu on the top right>Channel settings. - Change the name of the channel and save your changes. - Open QS.
